text: Athaba tara bale -- ''se eti jala kareche.’’ Tumi balo -- ''ami yadi eti jala kare thaki tahale tomara to allah‌ra tarapha theke kichu'i amara jan'ya ayatta kara na. Tini bhala janena tomara e bisaye ya balabali kara. Tini'i e byapare amara madhye o tomadera madhye saksi hisebe yathesta. Ara tini paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.’’
